content.prompt: The Catacomb of Priscilla was designed by its original founders to provide a

choices.label: burial place for members of the early Christian community
refuge for early Christian families at times of religious persecution
secret location to baptize early Christian converts
place of worship for large congregations of early Christians

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
